summary: The Informative Series is a set of mods that explain how Skyrim works in greater depth than Bethesda provided in the 'Help Menu' or 'Interactive Objects'.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]
[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/mods-stuff.png?w=920[/img]
[line]

[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/alchemy.png?w=920[/img]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39326/?]Informative Alchemy[/url][/b]
[list][*]Modifies the Alchemy section of the Help Menu.[*]Now includes explanations for Alchemical Effects.[*]Now includes list of ingredient combinations which produce each Alchemical Effect.[/list]
[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/compatibility.png?w=920[/img]
[youtube]ptFbXb3stgc?vq=highres[/youtube]

[line]

[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/blacksmith.png?w=920[/img]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52464/?]Informative Blacksmith[/url][/b]
[list][*]Modifies the Blacksmithing section of the Help Menu.[*] Now includes explanations for the Grindstone.[*] Now includes explanations for the Workbench.[*] Now includes explanations for the Forges.[*] Now includes explanations for the Anvil.[*] Now includes explanations for the Tanning Rack.[*] Now includes explanations for the Smelter.[*] Now includes explanations for the Smithing Skill Tree, Perks and their effects.[*] Now includes explanations for the Armour classes.[*] Now includes explanations for the Weapon Classes.[*] Now includes explanations for the the Steed Stone.[*] Now includes explanations for the Item Quality, Armour and Weapon Improvement.[*] Now includes explanations for the Fortify Smithing potions.[*] Now includes explanations for the Fortify Smithing gear.[*] Now includes a list of Smithing material item codes for Skyrim, Dawnguard, Hearthfire & Dragonborn.[/list]
[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/compatibility.png?w=920[/img]
[youtube]npvW-wmjrKw?vq=highres[/youtube]

[line]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/disease.png?w=920[/img]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52465/?]Informative Disease[/url][/b]
[list][*]Modifies the Disease section of the Help Menu.[*]Now includes explanations for each contractible Disease in Skyrim.[*]Now includes explanations for how each disease is contracted.[*]Now includes explanations for the effect that each Disease has on the player.[*]Now includes explanations for Shrines, People, Potions, and Alchemy which cure Disease.[*]Now includes explanations for Immunities.[*]Now includes explanations for the Bloodspring.[*]Now includes explanations for Vampirism and Lycanthropy.[/list]
[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/compatibility.png?w=920[/img]
[youtube]7vFPHFQJMos?vq=highres[/youtube]

[line]

[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/enchanter.png?w=920[/img]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52544/?]Informative Enchanter[/url][/b]
[list][*]Modifies the Enchanting section of the Help Menu.[*]Now includes explanations for Enchanting.[*]Now includes explanations for Disenchanting.[*]Now includes explanations for Fueling Enchants.[*]Now includes explanations for Recharging Weapons.[*]Now includes explanations for Soul Gem Levels.[*]Now includes explanations for Soul Size.[*]Now includes explanations for Boosting Enchantment Strength.[*]Now includes explanations for Fortify Enchanting Herbs List.[*]Now includes explanations for Enchantment Perks.[*]Now includes explanations for Shield Enchantments.[*]Now includes explanations for Weapon Enchantments.[*]Now includes explanations for Rare Weapon Enchantments.[*]Now includes explanations for Armor Enchantments.[*]Now includes explanations for where each Enchantment can be applied.[/list]
[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/compatibility.png?w=920[/img]
[youtube]5jjskU-zdYg?vq=highres[/youtube]

[line]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/training.png?w=920[/img]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39397/?]Informative Training[/url][/b]
[list][*]Modifies the Training section of the Help Menu.[*]Provides a list of all Trainers.[*]Provides the level at which each Trainer is able to Train.[*]Provides all Trainers locations.[*]Provides all Trainers travel routes and schedules.[*]Indicates if a Trainer is also a merchant, what they buy and sell.[*]Indicates if a Trainer is a potential Follower.[/list]
[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/compatibility.png?w=920?[/img]
[youtube]6kEUaotAKQ4?vq=highres[/youtube]

[line]

[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/shrines.png?w=920[/img]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39069/?]Informative Shrines[/url][/b]
[list][*]Modifies the message received when using Shrines in Skyrim.[*]Replaces the old “Blessing added” message.[*]Provides new message that states the status effect received, and the number of hours it last.[/list]
[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/compatibility-shrines.png?w=920[/img]
[youtube]C4giEsA2He0?vq=highres[/youtube]

[line]

[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/standing-stones.png?w=920[/img]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39093/?]Informative Standing Stones[/url][/b]
[list][*]Modifies the message received when using Standing Stones in Skyrim.[*]Replaces the old message with the actual information pertaining to the status effects each Standing Stone grants when its Sign is selected.[*]Omits the unnecessary repetition of the statement “You may only have one sign at a time” from all stones, for two reasons. [*]Reason #1 is that the statement is so obvious, that it goes without saying. [*]Reason #2 is due to the addition of the 'Aetherial Crown' obtained during 'Lost to the Ages', (Dawnguard DLC).[/list]
[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/compatibility-standing-stones.png?w=920[/img]
[youtube]Qc3MLRQ4eH4?vq=highres[/youtube]

[line]

[img]https://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/whole-installation.jpg?w=920[/img]
